modName: An excessively lore-unfriendly dress by Hentai
summary:
Lore Destroyer Dress
Find it inside the BreezeHome
It is excessively Lore-unfriendly but I have a crazy idea.
If you don\'t download it, It will never ever ruin your precious Lore. I\'m sure.
descriptionHtml:
Hentai\'s Lore Destroyer Dress


release date : January 2012
Category: clothes
Armor rating : clothes
Mod version : 1.0
Author: Hentai


Description
===========
Lore Destroyer Dress
Find it inside the BreezeHome
It is excessively Lore-unfriendly but I have a crazy idea.
If you don\'t download it, It will never ever ruin your precious Lore. I\'m sure.



Install
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and paste them in your Skyrim/Data folder. 
Check the esp file on skyrim launcher menu


Uninstall
=========
Delete Folder
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\clothes\\Weddingdress\\
Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\clothes\\Weddingdress\\

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.


Tools Used
==========
Blender
NIFSkope
Photoshop


Permissions 
==========
1. Do not upload this file on Steam Workshop until furthur notice. ( I like Nexus so much more as a modder)
2.  Feel free to use everything in this file.
3.  Everything I made for Obliviion is free to convert to Skyrim. Since Im not going to convert them myself.
author: Hentai
